mapper.select: select ft.feed_id, ft.user_id, ft.feed_content, fiut.feed_img_url, ut.profile_img_url, ut.nickname, (select count(*) from feed_like_tb where feed_id = ft.feed_id) as like_count from save_board_tb sbt left outer join feed_tb ft on sbt.board_id = ft.feed_id left outer join user_tb ut on ft.user_id = ut.user_id left outer join feed_img_url_tb fiut on ft.feed_id = fiut.feed_id where sbt.save_board_userId = #{userId} and sbt.menu_category_id = 1
